html: (1 Nephi 21:7)."Him whom man despiseth." Christ was "despised and rejected of men" (Isaiah 53:3) and "set at nought" (Mark 9:12). Once again, Joseph Smith could also fit this description, for the prophecy has come true that his "name should be had for good and evil among all nations, kindreds, and tongues." (JS H 1:33.)
